TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHttpSessionState

summary.span: 定義合約以實作自訂工作階段狀態容器。

span.span: Defines the contract to implement a custom session-state container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作階段狀態容器會提供存取權的工作階段狀態值和目前工作階段的相關的資訊。A session-state container provides access to the session-state values and related information for the current session. 在工作階段狀態容器中所包含的工作階段資訊公開給應用程式程式碼，透過類別使用屬性。Session information included in a session-state container is exposed to application code through the class using the property. 類別是工作階段狀態容器的包裝函式類別。The class is a wrapper class for a session-state container. 工作階段狀態容器的 ASP.NET 實作類別。The ASP.NET implementation of a session-state container is the class. 在要求中，開頭期間事件，建立，並於其中填入物件，並將它指派給目前。At the beginning of a request, during the event, the creates and populates an object and assigns it to the current . 在要求中，結尾期間事件，擷取物件從目前並執行任何必要的工作階段工作，例如寫入工作階段存放區中的工作階段值，或放棄工作階段。At the end of a request, during the event, the retrieves the object from the current and performs any required session work, such as writing the session values to the session store, or abandoning the session. 如果要求突然終止，例如透過重新導向，如會執行相同的清除，藉由呼叫方法。If the request is abruptly terminated, such as through a redirect, the performs the same cleanup by calling the method. 若要建立自訂的工作階段狀態容器，請建立可實作介面。To create a custom session-state container, create a class that implements the interface. 如果您要建立您自己自訂的工作階段狀態容器，您也必須以取代使用您自己自訂的模組。If you are creating your own custom session-state container, you must also replace the with your own custom module. 自訂模組會建立您的自訂工作階段狀態容器的執行個體，並將它新增至目前使用方法。Your custom module will create an instance of your custom session-state container and add it to the current using the method. 自訂的工作階段狀態模組的範例包含在類別概觀。An example of a custom session-state module is included in the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作介面來建立新的工作階段狀態容器類別，名為`MySessionState`。The following code example implements the interface to create a new session-state container class named `MySessionState`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/CS/mysessionstate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/VB/mysessionstate.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abandon() cil managed

summary.span: 結束目前的工作階段。

span.span: Ends the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來清除工作階段資料，引發**Session_OnEnd** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中定義的事件。The method is used to clear out session data and raise the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作方法的介面。The following code example implements the method of the interface. 在程式碼範例複製行為類別，因為它會新增屬性設為`true`時呼叫方法。The code example duplicates the behavior of the class in that it adds an property that is set to `true` when the method is called. 屬性會檢查期間的工作階段狀態模組事件，以判斷是否已放棄的工作階段，以及工作階段狀態模組清除工作階段資料，並執行**Session_OnEnd**事件。The property is checked by the session-state module during the event to determine whether the session has been abandoned, and the session-state module clears out session data and executes the **Session_OnEnd** event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/CS/mysessionstate.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/VB/mysessionstate.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CodePage { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CodePage : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目前工作階段的字碼頁識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the code-page identifier for the current session.

value.span: 目前工作階段的字碼頁識別項。

span.span: The code-page identifier for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字元集 （字碼頁） 用來解譯多位元組字元資料，判斷字元值，並排序次序。A character set (code page) is used to interpret multi-byte character data, determining character value, and therefore sort order. 字碼頁設定僅適用於多位元組字元資料，而無法 Unicode 字元資料。Code-page settings apply only to multi-byte character data, not to Unicode character data. 這屬性會提供與舊版 ASP 只有相容性。This property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果您不需要維護回溯相容性的 ASP 網頁，使用屬性屬性改為。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property of the property instead. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作屬性介面來取得和設定目前回應的編碼方式。The following code example implements the property of the interface to get and set the encoding for the current response. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/CS/mysessionstate.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/VB/mysessionstate.vb#10)]

span.span: One of the values that indicate whether the application is configured for cookieless sessions.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回的值為基礎的列舉值`cookieless`屬性組態項目。The property returns a enumeration value that is based on the value of the `cookieless` attribute of the configuration element. 如果`cookieless`屬性設定為`true`，則屬性會傳回，否則屬性會傳回。If the `cookieless` attribute is set to `true`, then the property returns ; otherwise, the property returns . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定`cookieless`的屬性[sessionState 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)項目`true`若要變更 Web.config 檔案中屬性。The following code example sets the `cookieless` attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) element to `true` in the Web.config file to change the property. 此範例應用程式組態，如屬性會傳回。For this sample application configuration, the property would return . ``` ```

summary.span: 取得或設定目前工作階段的地區設定識別項 (LCID)。

span.span: Gets or sets the locale identifier (LCID) of the current session.

value.span: 執行個體，指定目前工作階段的文化特性。

span.span: A instance that specifies the culture of the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`LCID`屬性會提供與舊版 ASP 只有相容性。This `LCID` property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果您不需要維護回溯相容性的 ASP 網頁，使用屬性改為。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead. ASP.NET 不會在工作階段狀態儲存的地區設定識別碼。ASP.NET does not store the locale identifier in session state. 屬性呼叫來取得和設定識別碼。The property calls the to get and set the identifier. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作屬性介面來取得和設定目前頁面的地區設定識別碼。The following code example implements the property of the interface to get and set the locale identifier for the current page. span.span: Gets the current session-state mode.

summary.span: 取得和設定在工作階段狀態提供者終止工作階段之前，要求之間允許的逾時週期 (以分鐘為單位)。

span.span: Gets and sets the time-out period (in minutes) allowed between requests before the session-state provider terminates the session.

value.span: 逾時期限，以分鐘為單位。

span.span: The time-out period, in minutes.
